comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Could be writer George Randolph Chester (1869-1924): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Randolph_Chester

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This story in the New York Times (September 1, 1914) reports that Chester's popular stories about the character "Coredlia Blossom" had been running for five years in The Saturday Evening Post, a weekly magazine, and were now presented as a drama on the New York stage: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9A04EEDB1430E7...:
